page.title: 13THE LIBRARY -IRVINE
page.content: The library is in the same building as Cunninghame District Council and has been there since 1977.There is one professional librarian and four assistants who are in charge of 67000 books.No fines are charged at the moment.Records,newspapers and taped stories for people with poor eyesight can be borrowed also.The most popular books were romance with {Catherine {Cookson,Virginia Andrews }and {Wilbur {Smith.}Defacing of books was the biggest problem with dogs chewing and even people cutting out pictures. {Future-}Unfortunately it was too far away from the town centre and there were plans to move it back.It is about 1\ miles from our area to the library and few people in our school visit it.
